channel.title: Python on Juneleung Chan
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Juneleung Chan

item.title: 达芬奇定时截图静帧 Grab stills every specified time
item.description: * 目标：数据集构造 * Goal: Grab Stills for dataset * 任务：从开始时间码到结束时间码之间，每隔指定时间截图静帧到图库 * Task: From the start timecode to the end timecode, grab still frames to the gallery every specified time * 语言：Python * Language: Python * 软件：达芬奇 * Software: DaVinci Resolve testing clip is the trailer of OPPENHEIMER <!DOCTYPE html> Github: https://github.com/juneleung/DR_GrabStills <!DOCTYPE html> Code <!DOCTYPE html> code @juneleung 20230821 <!DOCTYPE html>

item.title: UE远程渲染 UE Remote Rendering
item.description: * 目标：UE远程渲染 * Goal: UE remote rendering * 任务：UE工程在局域网远程多台渲染子节点渲染 * Task: The UE project is rendered by multiple rendering sub-nodes remotely in the LAN * 语言：Python * Language: Python * 软件：Unreal 5.1 * Language: Unreal 5.1 <!DOCTYPE html> Github: https://github.com/juneleung/UERemoteRendering <!DOCTYPE html> Introduction <!DOCTYPE html> code For more operating instructions, please see the github repository. @juneleung 20230629 <!DOCTYPE html>

item.title: 人员信息数据库 SQL Demo of Personnel Data
item.description: * 目标：数据库构造 * Goal: SQL building * 任务：这是一个个人数据管理数据库。包括添加数据库信息、查询、显示、转换等功能。 * Task: This is a management database of personal data data. Including functions such as adding to the database, querying, displaying, and converting. * 语言：Python, SQLite3 * Language: Python, SQLite3 <!DOCTYPE html> Github: https://github.com/juneleung/PersonalDataSQL_Sqlite3_Py_demo <!DOCTYPE html> Introduction Information about each person includes: name address phone Supported formats for personal data include: json yaml xml csv Display format include: txt html Convert format include:

item.title: 电影数据库爬虫 Web crawler for Movie Database
item.description: * 目标：电影数据库建设 * Goal: movie database construction * 任务：根据电影信息，如电影名，查找对应的豆瓣和IMDB网页 * Task: find the corresponding Douban and IMDB web pages according to the movie information, such as the movie name * 语言：Python * Language: Python <!DOCTYPE html> Github: https://github.com/juneleung/bsDoubIMDB <!DOCTYPE html> Code <!DOCTYPE html> code @juneleung 20230330 <!DOCTYPE html>
